text: there's a cracking story in some of the
papers today about the police finding an
underground hideout used by a gang of
robbers it's described as an excavated
layer that's been dug under the road
sounds fascinating
[Music]
we found it this is the hole described
in the paper this is where the gang was
living for six months this is where they
were stashing the phones watches laptops
that they'd stolen there are rooms down
here with mattresses where they could
sleep there's also a bathroom that they
were using it's pretty dirty down there
and it smells a bit too and there's a
reason for that because not everything
here is as it seems
it isn't underground this is not an
excavated layer it's not a tunnel dug
under a footpath it's a disused toilet
it's not ten feet below the surface it's
ten feet above the surface this is a
good reminder of the first thing I ever
learned at journalism school always
check your facts and always go and take
a look for yourself
